title: Emergency Response Simulation-Based Training Program for Occupational Health Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and experience in responding to workplace emergencies
context.additional_context: Process for in-service occupational health nurses to conduct simulation and basic life support training via real-time video conferencing tools using digital devices

learning_goals: Perform systematic emergency response procedures with over 90% accuracy during workplace emergencies through first aid simulation training
Apply appropriate first aid to cardiac arrest patients within 3 minutes using Basic Life Support (BLS) techniques
Achieve over 80% application rate when operating workplace emergency systems and educating peers based on learned content

resources: Virtual Patient Cases for Simulation-Based Training
BLS (Basic Life Support) Training Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
